method.name: Nearest Mean Classifier

reference.ref: T. Hastie, R. Tibshirani, J. Friedman (2001). The elements of statistical learning: Data mining, inference, and prediction. Springer.

generalDescription.objective: To perform a classification task by means of the centroids of each class, using the 1-NN rule.
generalDescription.howWork: It employs the class means to classify new instances, computing their distances and selecting the nearest class mean, using the 1-NN rule
